title: Drawing, "Six Decorative Studies; Verso, Anatomical Study", 1814–18
medium: Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes over graphite on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Six decorative studies showing partitions with putti and garlands; allegory of time. Verso: Anatomical study of right arm; frieze of Nereid and Triton.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Six Decorative Studies; Verso, Anatomical Study", 1814–18.Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes over graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2372.
